pros: Double hooks work especially well for handbags

customer_reviews.title: Drunk octopus wants to fight you
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold a lot of weight but doesn’t need to. Love my “drunk octopus wants to fight you” hooks. Bought them for a lot cheaper on amazon than I can find them in the store
customer_reviews.author: Old lady going back to school

customer_reviews.title: Should come with shorter screws
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars but the screws they sent are useless to me because they are way too long. They are an inch and a half. I need to install these hooks on 3/4 thick plywood where both sides are exposed. In the past when I bought hooks like this the screws were much shorter. I definitely have screws at home that will do the job, but they will not have a rounded head, and they will not have the same finish, so the hooks will look like a lazy, crappy installation job. I would pay a dollar more to get these delivered with both short and long screws.
customer_reviews.author: Colby Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Same size but not as heavy duty as my previous hooks
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to match some hooks that were already installed in my closet. The measurements are very close and they look similar but the hooks themselves are narrower and the back of the base is slightly indented. My guess is they did this to reduce the amount of metal it takes to install. There isn't any template so getting the screws in the right position without the hooks leaning one way or the other is a bit challenging. If I had seen them in person prior to purchasing I would have chosen something else as I could have compared my hooks with these and found an exact match.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution for my Wife's Numerous Towels
customer_reviews.text: These double prong hooks have proven to be the ideal solution for hanging my wife's multiple towels on the back of our bathroom door. I was able to install five of these double hooks on the back of our master bath door, which gives my wife ample space for her many towels and a robe. These hooks were easy to install but I used shorter screws than the ones that were provided, which were apparently meant to mount these hooks on a wall and were so long that they would have gone all the way through our door.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis A Edge Jr

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad that I purchased these hooks
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad that I purchased these hooks. I wanted to have something that holds stuff well and doesn't fall or chip my wall. These hooks are well made and very sturdy. Also, you could replace these hooks to any other place by just unscrewing it. Not like the others, I don't need to worry about that these hooks would fall by hanging heavy weights on them.
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to hang an jacket and umbrella in my office and they work just fine for that. Comes with screws that seem to be of good quality/ secure length. Best to put them in with a power drill and find a wall stud, but if your hanging less than 10ish pounds you can totally use a screwdriver and just put them into a easy spot in drywall.
customer_reviews.author: Flagstafflawyer

customer_reviews.title: Lame hardware
customer_reviews.text: The screws are not brushed nickel like the hooks but are instead just plain, cheap silver screws. Worse yet, the screws are so long that I couldn't even install the hooks on thick oak doors because the screws would have nearly penetrated the surface of the other side of the door. The decision to include this kind of installation hardware is thoughtless and stupid. The hooks are still sitting unused because in the midst of Covid 19 I'm not going to go roaming around a hardware store looking for the right kind of screws. Why should the customer have to spend additional time and money on this anyway? It's just dumb.
customer_reviews.author: E. Beckstrom

customer_reviews.title: Get Ready to Spend More on Shorter Screws!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks look nice and are sturdy, but they came with unnecessarily long wood screws. I think that a closet or bathroom door is a good spot for this hook, but the screws are longer than the door are thick. Fortunately, I figured this out before I screwed right through the other side of the door. I had to buy some 1-inch screws to do the installation properly. Number 6 satin finish screws, one-inch or 1.25-inch is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: David EckTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality and finish
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a hook that was rugged and would not stick out too far from the wall and risk putting an eye out. I installed these in a pantry right inside the door. They look great and the double hooks side by side give two places to hang items from. I don't think you will be disappointed in the quality. I put small board on the wall in the pantry and mounted these right to it.
customer_reviews.author: Always Tinkering

customer_reviews.title: Franklin Brass are the heavy, well-crafted hook with a proper finish
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered both the double and single versions of these Franklin Brass hooks, and these are the true brushed nickel hooks I use in places they'll be seen -- bathroom hooks for the hair dryer, bathrobe, clothes hangars, or in the mudroom. I've bought the cheaper multi-packs for laundry room or storage shed use, but these are heavy, with an excellent brushed nickel finish -- bright brushed look, not shiny chrome, and not dull and dark like some lower quality brushed nickel I've ordered.
customer_reviews.author: ATLLeader

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but “mounting hardware included” does NOT include drywall anchors
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but the product description is misleading: when the description says “mounting hardware included”, that does NOT include any drywall anchors. Unless you already have a ton of anchors laying around, or are planning on mounting all of these in front of wood studs, check out some other options first.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 kids and they each have one of these hooks for their back packs. They're amazing and my middle school son packs a pretty heavy backpack, the hooks can handle it and more. They're relatively small so they're no ugly to look at or distracting in any way. I love them. When we moved we forgot to take the ones we had at the other house, it took me about one week of having backpacks all over my house to realize I cant live without these
customer_reviews.author: Kfir Cohen

customer_reviews.title: I use these everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I’ve reordered these several times for umpteen places around my house and I really like them. I love how the hooks are smooth with rounds so I never have to worry about anything snagging on them. It looks like they are die-cast zinc then stamped and punched for the holes. The hole positions are ideal for hanging on drywall (hanging on a stud not needed) and they go up in seconds with a hand drill with a Phillips driver.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Good but best for small items
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are fine if you only want to use them for small things. If you’re the kind of person who likes to get out of the shower and throw the towel on the hook...ain’t happening. You’ll need to shower with an amazing basketball player to make that shot. Hey, for some that may make it a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Ole’ Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: These hooks work very well. I just moved and needed a place to hang my belts and these hooks are perfect. I used a cordless drill with a 3/32" drill bit to drill the provided screws into the wall which fit perfectly with these hooks. My closet now has three of these hooks hanging up and all my belts are hanging along the wall instead of draped over the chair in my living room. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Hook
customer_reviews.text: These hooks were just what we needed. They are easy to install and sturdy enough to hold our bath sheets. Moving into a new house you never know what little things you will need. The towel racks in the bathroom are across the room, with no place to put a towel within easy reach after a shower. The hooks did the job!
customer_reviews.author: D Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Great for backs of doors; nice-looking!
customer_reviews.text: If you have an old home with solid wood doors--these are fantastic. You can use them to hook jackets, towels, purses, etc. We also put some at a lower level, inside a closet, and on a chair rail for children to hang their backpacks and halloween bags or other various treasures.
customer_reviews.author: B. S. Diederich

customer_reviews.title: Not American but Chinese made and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, Chinese brand. I bought these because I thought they appeared to come from a US brand name but once arrived they were made in China and double the price the other made in China stuff Screws are way too long and don’t bind easily and the head tears up
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and brawn
customer_reviews.text: I had a coat rack with wooden pegs which were not heavy duty enough to withstand real life usage. I removed the pegs, filled in the holes with plastic wood, sanded, painted, and installed these hooks. I am very happy with the outcome. These are very solid and look fantastic. I was able to transform a coat rack that looked good but wasn't functional to a coat rack that looks great and is able to handle everything I could ask of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Mounting Screws Are Too Long
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine but the mounting screws are too long and will go through a standard door and poke through on the other side. I didn't have any screws handy with the same finish and width so I had to use a hacksaw to cut the screws. Since that takes the tip off the end of the screw they are difficult to screw in and the mounting hole becomes enlarged. I put some clear sealant in the holes and behind the hook before I screwed down tightly.
customer_reviews.author: mpfolly

customer_reviews.title: Nice Heavy Thick Hooks
customer_reviews.text: What the hook gon be? haha am I right or am I right? I have always been the hook, but also the sinker. Anyway, back to the hook. Nice hooks. Got these bad boys for my office and makes it convenient for other to hook their jacket when sticking around for a awhile
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Van Olphen

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am using these to hang towels on out by the pool. They are attached to a frame a built to hold the pool floats. They are just the right size (they don't stick out too far which would probably bend easily) and thick enough to handle large, wet towels. I bought two 5-packs so we've got plenty of hooks!
customer_reviews.author: Gotta Dive

customer_reviews.title: Great Household Hooks!
customer_reviews.text: Needed some hooks for around the house and not break the bank and these did the job. Used one to hang up vacuum attachments that had been previously only secured with a nail through dry wall. The screws provided reached the stud and are able to more than hold the attachments. I’d recommend purchasing if you need to some hooks for around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Skynest

customer_reviews.title: A WINNER!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I'd been looking for: An attractive, useful piece of hardware for hanging up some articles of clothing, such as jackets and coats just inside my front door. NOTE: I--only RARELY--will provide ANY product five stars. This hook is a REAL winner (and at a reasonable asking price)!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Clemens

customer_reviews.title: 1.5" screws are too long for many applications
customer_reviews.text: Hollowed out a bit in the back, but seem quite sturdy. Design is ok.. I like the surface finish. They look like they will hang well, but they came with very long screws that would go straight through my 1 3/8 inch door and waaaay too long for 3/4 closet inch trim. So I'll have to go buy 20 screws. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install hold pretty well and for the price you can’t beat
customer_reviews.text: Are use these for a couple towel racks and then put a few by the door for my dogs leashes. They were great used anchors to mount them in the wall and they hold solid. I would recommend plus they’re pretty cheap for the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Dabloesco

customer_reviews.title: works well, good price for 6
customer_reviews.text: Paid about $1 each, which I thought was a good price. Comes with screws, but I wanted shorter screws so used my own - I was not hanging heavy items, but wanted it to stay better than the 3M version. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: R. McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! A simple study hook to add some extra storage. Took 3 mins to install and arrived less than 24 hours which is always a plus. Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: N_Ram

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy hooks, just a little short.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy hooks. The metal is strong. The only issue may be the the sturdiness of what you attach them to.. The only reason I took off a star is because the hooks are a little short. Let's say for example you wanted to use it as a towel hook (which we did), you'd have a problem hanging a large fluffy towel on the hooks without the towels occasionally slipping off (especially on something that moves like a door).
customer_reviews.author: C E Long

customer_reviews.title: No mounting hardware
customer_reviews.text: Good value, except this didn't come with any mounting hardware (no screws or instructions as per the description). Will have to make a trip to Home Depot to get screws. After which I'm sure these will make a fine hook.
customer_reviews.author: Jevin

customer_reviews.title: Solid strong
customer_reviews.text: pretty strong solid hook. a lot cheaper than buying from homedepot. this is pretty sturdy but then again I don't hang over 10lb, I mostly use it for clothes, small bags to hang on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Hanole N.

customer_reviews.title: They don't hold well
customer_reviews.text: To me, the angle of the hooks is too small considering the wall. Hooks are ok but just ok. I would buy some other hook where the hook can hold more. I use it for my bath towel and my robe. The towel keeps falling.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Junk screws
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are good, but the screws are a joke. Cheap. Instantly strips out head. Be ready to go to the hardware store to get decent screws. So if you have to go to the hardware store, you might as well get everything there and skip Amazon compleatly.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great bathroom space saver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for hanging towels on the backs of our bathroom doors. The screws were a bit long for that and I switched them out, but the actual hooks work perfectly for hanging up all manner of bathing towels.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: Screws are waaaaaay to loooooong
customer_reviews.text: These are really sturdy and thick but the screws are waay tooo long so it is not the easiest to install. Maybe put in a few extra pairs of screws, shorter ones as an option?
customer_reviews.author: Khanu’s Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Includes 1 1/2" screws
customer_reviews.text: If you are installing these hooks on the back of hollow core doors you may need to buy shorter screws. I missed reading all of the info that includes 1.5" screws. Solid robe hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great hooks at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make a coat rack for my craft room. Piece of painted wood, measured the distance for five hooks, screwed in, mounted on wall, instant coat rack. They're the same quality you get at your local hardware store at a fraction of the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Russell

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice holds very wel.
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing these for a second time, luv them putting them in side the closets of each bedroom to hand my hand bags on believe me when I say I have lots of handbags in all sizes thx u Tommy H. Michael K. Luv my bags I was storing them in plastic containers I have so many I’m going to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Soengsugpd

customer_reviews.title: They are good but a little cheaper
customer_reviews.text: They are good and come with good screws but are a little on the flimsy side. It probably won't matter because they are only holding towels but these might be about as cheap as you can make them.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: I think I got the wrong one.
customer_reviews.text: It looked hard and good. But it was hard because the screw and hole didn't fit. I put it on the wall and it keeps moving and spinning. I wanna return this, but it is returnless item. Hmm....? How’s it going???
customer_reviews.author: Jacob.D.LEE

customer_reviews.title: Great price they look good too
customer_reviews.text: Great for hanging coats, umbrella, hats etc. they were about $1.25 each so the price was right. I ordered last year and they held up so I ordered more. Would rate 5 stars but I was missing a few screws so I rate 3
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: convenient hooks
customer_reviews.text: I use these hooks all over the house. They are strong enough to hold towels, robes, jackets etc. - they also come with the installation screws.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: A little thinner than I had expected.
customer_reviews.text: They work, easy to install. The metal is a little thinner that I expected so be careful with what you hang on it. Works good for hats and light jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and appearance. quality of mounting screws made installation a breeze. Perfect for what the intent was. Buy them and prove me wrong:)
customer_reviews.author: WaadMan

customer_reviews.title: Good Light Duty Hooks,  But Mounting Hardware was Missing
customer_reviews.text: The description stated that the mounting hardware is included, but it was missing from my order. As I was counting on this, minus two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Active Al

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this purchase, and the price matches the product. Hope this helps someone thinking about purchasing the item
customer_reviews.author: Carole S

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Sturdy. Come with long screws to put in dry wall. Got them to hang book bags off the wall. Perfect! Like how the hooks are off to the sides and do not stick out too much out off the wall when mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Solid hooks - HUGE screws
customer_reviews.text: The hooks itself is great. But, the screws that come with it are nearly 2 inches long. I had to go buy much short screws so it wasn't going to go too past the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great looking polished finish. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking polished finish. Very sturdy. At any price these are worth the money. It feels like it's sturdy enough to do finger pull ups on.
customer_reviews.author: Baman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected- and I’m really pleased with the sturdiness & durability. The hubby is using these in his home office for hats & coats.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and helpful
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into our first home (!) and the previous owners had those 3M strips all over the house, it was very weird. We took them all down and placed this instead. We use it to hang towels behind the doors mainly
customer_reviews.author: yusuf abusharif

customer_reviews.title: I will never look at these hooks the same...
customer_reviews.text: I will never look at these hooks the same... Everywhere I go, I see these exact same hooks. And they will always look like a drunk octopus trying to fight me. Thank you Amazon reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong hooks
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are strong and attractive. Installation was easy. You need a drill and wall anchors appropriate for the screws.
customer_reviews.author: RetroFresh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with one exception.
customer_reviews.text: The 5 piece set came exactly what was described with 5 screws. They were nicely packaged and came on time. The only exception is that it would be nice if it came with anchors. It wasn't a big deal for me cause I have plenty of anchors sitting around but I know it may be a hassle for some people hence the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for , I could not find these at the big box stores especially for this price
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended and looks good. Wish the screws were individually packed with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended and looks good. Wish the screws were individually packed with the hook, pretty sure I'll loose the pack of em before i install the last hook. Also would be nice if it came with dry wall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to install and strong! They hold my backpack on the heaviest days. They are a great way to keep things off the floor even when you're messy like me!
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Hook!!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are perfect for hanging clothes, they are sturdy and very handy, and also very easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Melodious Heart

customer_reviews.title: Good product - Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Installed all hooks throughout house. Look and feel is very good,. Easy install. Liked them so much - went and bought another set.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Jayjock

customer_reviews.title: Look and work great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to add more storage ability in a ring bathroom. These are high quality and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. Great for bathrooms and entry. Finish is a little dark but still looks nice and clean. Easy to install and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on a little kitchen cart to hold bags, towels etc great product sturdy very happy
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas I.

customer_reviews.title: Screws and wrong
customer_reviews.text: The screws that come with were much too long so I had to substitute shorter ones of my own.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Dongu

customer_reviews.title: Crazy good deal
customer_reviews.text: Grimly does it’s work and then sits quietly until it’s time to work again. Five for five! What? That’s a buck a hook Can’t touch this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our RV bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: These match the style of hooks that came with our Jayco RV, and adding them was super simple. Now we have plenty of bath towel hooks for when our family of 4 goes camping! We even added one high up on the shower wall to hang our microfiber cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: James Christ

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something simple to hang my dogs leashes, so I got a set of two. Perfect and easy to put up too.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: Like the double hook. cheap and easy to install. put a bunch around the RV polished looks nice and they are shaped well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm....
customer_reviews.text: Is it just me or do these look like a retarded octopus? Work great though!
customer_reviews.author: MOMMBIE

customer_reviews.title: Nice item.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Very sturdy and finish is nice. Includes very long screws which I did not use because I needed shorter screws.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Hangs well and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as pictured. Easy to install and holds our towels well. I only installed 2 but have tons extra if needed. Good price!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: finally after months, hubby has put them up on the doors and it's perfect. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: IRMA CARDENAS

customer_reviews.title: Like these!
customer_reviews.text: I needed more hangers on my bedroom closet to hold purses. They are working really well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy VA

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is a bit tricky | see review for tips.
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our small bathroom. It meets all our needs for holding scrubbies, bottles, razors, and soaps. Easy assembly: 1) tighten the "B" and "C" poles together. 2) insert the brackets first into the baskets and accessory then follow the instructions in the package. See my pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Gould

customer_reviews.title: Nice hooks
customer_reviews.text: These hooks have a nice finish and are very sturdy. Seem well made and should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: jansvendsen60

customer_reviews.title: Great quality on a Budget
customer_reviews.text: These are nice heavy and strong. Worked perfectly in my closet makeover. I have coats, pullovers, belts. A good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Clbrosch

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Comes with anchors and screws. I recommend using a drill.
customer_reviews.author: Toria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great item, great price, strong and looks great. Serves the purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Fortier

customer_reviews.title: hey they work
customer_reviews.text: I feel challenged by these angry little octupus when I enter my closet.
customer_reviews.author: TheCrowHouse

customer_reviews.title: Screws too long
customer_reviews.text: The screws that come with this product are too long. They just need to be no longer than 1/4 inch to 1/2 inch at the most. I had to go buy the screws. The product is great other than that very sturdy very nice look.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Had a narrow spot between shower and window where I wanted to hang a bath towel. Worked great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good product well made
customer_reviews.text: Just installed on bathroom door and One for hand towel by the sink look and feel sturdy so far and very nice
customer_reviews.author: Mirela

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Put them in my bathroom to hang towels on. Easy to install, very sturdy and looks nice. I would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Phil L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I put them in my closet to hang robes and so forth. Easy to install with a drill.
customer_reviews.author: MsC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Redid a closet and used these on the wall to hang out shoes. Work great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teesa Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Great for
customer_reviews.text: Great hooks, screws made it sturdy and easy to install. Gave it four stars cause some of the hooks had scratches.
customer_reviews.author: The General

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and look fine on wall, post, or back of door.
customer_reviews.text: Look great and very functional. Screws are worthless when using in hardwood placement. I used different screws to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: The Ground Pounder

customer_reviews.title: Worked just like they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I mean they are hooks. What else to say? I got exactly what I was expecting and they work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, a steal. Why buy those little wood plank all in a row hooks for $20 when you can place one here one there for a third of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: VelocityCat

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I am using them as small coat hooks for children in the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the kids’ coats in our foyer. Also nice look for bathroom towels.
customer_reviews.author: TravisMR2

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I could have used something with a slightly different angle to make it easier to hang towels on. But this product is what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Leberg

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: You never know when buying things via online photos, especially hardware like this. These hooks are really nice quality though and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not quite long enough.
customer_reviews.text: Hooks were short, hard to use, but keeping to use in garage.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Carte

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, heavy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s very sturdy, heavy, and comes with long enough screws to keep it in the wall. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Strong and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my entryway/command center. I only needed 3. I love it because it’s made out of a string metal. It’s so strong that it can carry my daughter backpack filled with 3 heavy books. I truly recommend this product if you’re planning on using it in the same way. I also like the color of the metal. It looks shiny and not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are well made, easy to install and come with all the hardwares needed. Be sure to drill pilot holes if you plan to install them on wood.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and appropriate.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hang aprons and reusable bags in my kitchen closet. They do the job, look nice, and didn't cost much at all. They're probably too small to handle outerwear except maybe hats.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B.

customer_reviews.title: BYOScrews
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't leave much room to hang so don't buy for towels. Overall the item it fine, I'm leaving a review because the screws are trash. They strip easy, expect to probably throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used these hooks for my bathroom. I installed them behind my bathroom door (out of sight) for the towels that I use to dry off with. Easy to assemble. Very sturdy. Came with what I needed to install. If I need any more hooks, I’ll definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tamaria Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like to use these hooks around the house. It's handy and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

product_meta.title: Franklin Brass FBDPRH5-MN-C Double Prong Robe Hook, 5-Pack, Matte Nickel, 5 Count
product_meta.description: Size:5 Pack| Color:Matte NickelOrganize in style with one easy step. From Franklin Brass, this double prong robe hook is designed to hold a wide variety of items coats, hats, handbags, umbrellas, towels, or robes. Perfectly suited for any room from foyers and hallways to bedrooms and bathrooms, even closets or anywhere some additional storage is needed.
feature_bullets: 35 pounds maximum weight capacity when mounted into solid wood or wood studs
Overall dimensions, when mounted: 2.8 inch x 1.8 inch x 1 inch
Mounting hardware and installation instructions included
Casual style coordinates with most home decor and provides an abundance of space for hanging items in the entryway, laundry room, bathroom, and bedroom
Matte nickel finish; Constructed of zinc die cast material
